mapper.select: SELECT s.id_seller as idSeller, s.id_person as idPerson, s.id_user as idUser, u.password as password, u.email as email, p.first_name as firstName, p.last_name as lastName, p.phone_number as phoneNumber, s.image_path as imagePath FROM seller s INNER JOIN user u on s.id_user=u.id_user INNER JOIN person p on s.id_person=p.id_person WHERE s.id_user = 2

SELECT publication.id_publication as idPublication, image_publication.path as imagePath, title as title, price as price FROM publication INNER JOIN image_publication on image_publication.id_publication=publication.id_publication INNER JOIN seller on seller.id_seller=publication.id_seller WHERE seller.id_seller =#{idSeller} and image_publication.status=1 and publication.status=1 and seller.status=1 GROUP BY publication.id_publication;
